root: ^That all the souls for the night?
^You nod, glancing around. You can still feel the presence of many other souls, but they are not ones you have the time to attend to.
^You have to return to Hell, your home, and hope you got everything right.
^Your approach the stairway to descend, and wonder if it feels hotter than usual.
^The powers that be will be unhappy with you.
^At least you sent the people to the right places?
